Title: 🚨 TERROR ATTACK IN HAIFA: A deadly stabbing terror attack unfold...
Description: 🚨 TERROR ATTACK IN HAIFA: A deadly stabbing terror attack unfolded at the Lev HaMifratz Mall in Haifa this morning, leaving one man dead and several others injured.Magen David Adom (MDA) emergency responders arrived at the scene and confirmed the death of a 70-year-old man, who had been stabbed in the neck. Authorities also noted that he had suffered a gunshot wound to his foot, likely sustained when security forces opened fire on the attacker.Four additional victims were treated at the scene. Among them were three individuals in critical condition—a man and woman in their 30s, and a 15-year-old boy. A 70-year-old woman suffered moderate injuries. The wounded were transported to Rambam Health Care Campus, where one was immediately taken into surgery.According to police reports, the terrorist, identified as 20-year-old Yitro Shaheen from Shfaram, was neutralized by an armed security guard. Investigators say he had recently returned to Israel after spending several months abroad. Title: Massive Weapons Shipments on Their Way to Israel Secretary of Sta...
Description: Massive Weapons Shipments on Their Way to IsraelSecretary of State Rubio has signed an order classifying the upcoming arms deal with Israel as an emergency matter tied to U.S. national security interests. This designation allows the administration to bypass the lengthy congressional approval process.So, what’s on the way? • 35,500 heavy bombs (MK-84 and BLU-117, exact split unspecified). The MK-84 is a nearly one-ton bomb (previously delayed by Biden), while the BLU-117 is an upgraded version with improved penetration against fortified targets—essentially a -budget bunker buster- that also delivers significant above-ground destruction. • 4,000 BLU-109 bunker busters (used in the critical strike on Nasrallah). While useful for operations in Iran, they are not heavy enough to penetrate Iran’s deepest nuclear facilities, such as the Fordow enrichment site. • 4,800 BLU-110 bombs (~450 kg each, a slightly improved version of the MK-83, essentially standard half-ton bombs). • 5,000 JDAM guidance kits to convert -dumb- iron bombs into precision-guided weapons.This is a massive munitions package by any standard.It’s good to have true friends in Washington.Credit: Tamir Morag, Channel 14.WHATSAPP CHANNEL 🔗 https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Va4EEJU7YSdAqzGs362FTELEGRAM 🔗 https://t.me/JewishBreakingNewsTelegramWHATSAPP GROUP 🔗 https://chat.whatsapp.com/JMJbkda2SRLCc1ascbYVAU
